TestCase.name: testCube
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[b, c, EXPR$2], where=[>(EXPR$2, 3)]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, COUNT(*) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) StreamExecExpand(projects=[{b, c, 0 AS $e}, {b, null AS c, 1 AS $e}, {null AS b, c, 2 AS $e}, {null AS b, null AS c, 3 AS $e}]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, c]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupingsets
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[b, EXPR$1, 0 AS EXPR$2, 0 AS EXPR$3]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG(a) AS EXPR$1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testRollup
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[b, c, EXPR$2]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, COUNT(*) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) StreamExecExpand(projects=[{b, c, 0 AS $e}, {b, null AS c, 1 AS $e}, {null AS b, null AS c, 3 AS $e}]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, c]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
